meanings.definition: Relating to or resembling a sporangium.
meanings.sent1: The sporangial structure was small and round.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the sporangial characteristics of the plant.
meanings.sent3: The sporangial shape looked like a tiny ball of seeds.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity bloomed like a sporangial garden in spring.
meanings.sent5: The sporangial appearance was so distinct that it stood out among the other structures.

meanings.sent1: The sporangial spores were released into the air.
meanings.sent2: The spores showed sporangial characteristics under the microscope.
meanings.sent3: The sporangial spores danced in the wind like tiny fairies.
meanings.sent4: His ideas spread like sporangial spores, reaching every corner of the room.
meanings.sent5: The sporangial spores floated gently, carried by the breeze, spreading life around them.
